parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Hebrew Word
str2: Of Hebrew origin; properly, firm, i.e. trustworthy; adverbially, surely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.

parse: Adverb
str2: From an adverb form of hode; in this same spot, i.e. Here or hither.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Whosoever, whichsoever, whatsoever.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I taste, (b) I experience. A primary verb; to taste; by implication, to eat; figuratively, to experience.

parse: Noun - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: Death, physical or spiritual. From thnesko; death.

parse: Conjunction
str2: A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Article - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: From basileus; properly, royalty, i.e. rule, or a realm.

parse: Noun - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: To come, go.

parse: Preposition
str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Noun - Dative Feminine Singular
str2: From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.
